rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 32 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 12:00 PM, 16 July 2025(Wednesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Quezon, Laguna, Metro Manila, Rizal, Tarlac and Bataan within the next 2-3 hours.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
